name: International Flavors & Fragrances Inc.
description: International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. (IFF) is a global leader in the creation of flavor and fragrance solutions for a diverse range of consumer products. Founded in 1833, IFF has built a legacy of innovation and quality that has established it as a trusted partner in the food, beverage, personal care, and household markets. The company specializes in developing flavors that enhance the taste of food and beverages, as well as fragrances that provide desirable scents for personal care and home products. IFF's commitment to sustainability drives its efforts to create natural and environmentally friendly products while also investing in cutting-edge research and technology to meet the evolving needs of consumers. With a presence in over 40 countries and a diverse portfolio of products, IFF serves a wide variety of industries, helping brands create unique sensory experiences. The company's mission is to combine artistry and science to deliver innovative solutions that improve everyday life, while prioritizing ethical sourcing and sustainable practices.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
